items.title: Mcap of 8 of top-10 most valued firms jumps Rs 1.72 lakh cr; Reliance biggest winner
items.description: From the top-10 pack, Reliance Industries, Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), Bharti Airtel, ICICI Bank, Infosys, Hindustan Unilever Ltd, Life Insurance Corporation of India (LIC) and Bajaj Finance were the gainers.
